thread.section_title: The Montcalm London Marble Arch - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Outstanding
thread.title_full: Outstanding - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Leah A
title: Outstanding
text: Second visit and this time took my family. Hoped it would be as good as my first visit and wasn't disappointed. We had the most beautiful rooms, facilities were superb but most of all the staff really cared about our stay and did all they could to make our short break very special and memorable. Love this place and recommend unreservedly.
